title: Longsword Proficiency
content:
ciency Information

Add your Proficiency Bonus to Attack Rolls with Longswords.

How to unlock Longsword Proficiency

Longsword Proficiency can be acquired by

Bard Lvl 1 Rogue Lvl 1 Elf Githyanki
